articles.title: DPRK-China Joint Art Performance Marks Spring Festival
articles.content:
DPRK-China Joint Art Performance Marks Spring Festival
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- A DPRK-China joint art performance was given at the concert hall of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory on Tuesday to mark this year's spring festival.
					 It was co-sponsored by the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the Central Committee of the Korea-China Friendship Association, the Chinese Ministry of Culture and the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health who doubles as chairman of the Central Committee of the Korea-China Friendship Association, officials of ministries and national institutions, artistes, sports persons and citizens of Pyongyang. 
					
					 Also present there to enjoy the performance were Ambassador Liu Hongcai and staff members of the Chinese embassy, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies, their spouses and Chinese guests here.
					
					 Prior to the performance, Kang Ha Guk and the Chinese ambassador made speeches.
					
					 Then began the joint art performance given by teachers and students of the conservatory and members of the Jilin Provincial Song and Dance Ensemble of China.
					
					 Korean artistes truthfully represented mixed trio and pangchang  "Ode to the Motherland", female solo "People Are United in Single Mind," female folk solo "Moran Hill", Chinese song "Qingzang Plateau" and other numbers, deeply impressing the audience.
					
					 Chinese artistes staged dance "Beautiful China" and saenap solo "Birds Greet Phoenix" and other numbers while musicians successfully presented Korean song "Platycodon."
					
					 The performance ended with chorus "DPRK-China friendship will last forever ". It offered a good occasion in boosting the traditional friendly relations between the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, Tuesday gave a reception on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of victory in the Cuban revolution.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Il, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Kim Hyong Jun, Chae Chun Hui and other officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and military attaches of foreign embassies and representatives of international bodies here.
					
					 The Cuban ambassador said at the reception that the victory of the Cuban revolution was the result of the self-sacrificing struggle of the revolutionaries and patriots, paying noble tribute to them.
					
					 The Cuban people, who registered great achievements despite the imperialists' ceaseless blockade to stifle the Cuban revolution, will as ever struggle against imperialism, he noted.
					
					 The friendly bilateral relations provided by the great leaders are solid, he said, adding that the Cuban people would always stand by the people of the DPRK.
					
					 He wished the heroic Korean people greater successes under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop in his speech said that under the correct leadership of the Communist Party of Cuba the Cuban people has defended the country, revolution and gains of socialism from the vicious moves of the U.S. imperialists to isolate and stifle Cuba.
					
					 He wished the Cuban people greater success in their efforts to implement the decisions of the 6th Congress of the Communist Party of Cuba.
					
					 He said that the ties of comradely obligation between the two countries provided by the great leaders are being carried forward under the deep care of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He stressed that the people of the DPRK would as ever work hard to achieve the world peace and security and the prosperity common to mankind together with the Cuban people.

articles.title: Ethiopian President Wishes DPRK Greater Victory This Year
articles.content:
Ethiopian President Wishes DPRK Greater Victory This Year
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Ethiopian President Mulatu Teshome met DPRK Ambassador to his country Kim Hyok Chol on Jan. 15.
					 At the meeting the president congratulated the government and people of the DPRK on achieving many successes in the development of the country, holding aloft the banner of the Juche idea under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, wishing the DPRK greater victory in this year, too.
					
					 He expressed hope that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to favorably develop in various domains in the future, too.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ushering in New Heyday of Construction
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ushering in New Heyday of Construction 
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial calls for making innovations true to the far-reaching construction plan of the Workers' Party of Korea and ushering in a new heyday of construction.
					 The construction is the patriotic cause of lasting value to build a thriving socialist nation and people's paradise and an important work to enhance the economic might and civilization standard of the country, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the fixed will of supreme leader Kim Jong Un to successfully carry forward the idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the Juche-based architecture and their leadership feats and thus lay the firm foundation of a socialist economic power in a short period and usher in a new era of cultural efflorescence in the 21st century.
					
					 All builders should rush like a wind in the "Masikryong speed" and leave a trace of the worthwhile life with the ambition and courage to become performers of labor feats and heroes of construction in the present era where a new heyday of construction is being opened.
					
					 It is necessary to set up monumental edifices representative of the era by the concerted efforts of the service personnel and people, the powerful fighting mode of Songun Korea.
					
					 A new heyday of construction is premised on the positive backing of various fields of the national economy. 
					
					 Various fields of the national economy including the metal, building- material and power industries and railway transport should effect a great surge in production to give strong impetus to the grand construction drive guided by the WPK.

articles.title: It Is Steadfast Will of DPRK to Champion Peace: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
It Is Steadfast Will of DPRK to Champion Peace: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- It is the consistent policy and the firm will of the DPRK to champion peace, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article Tuesday.
					 It continues:
					
					 The DPRK has so far put forward a slew of proposals to end the fragile ceasefire mechanism and replace it with a lasting peace-keeping one and made sincere efforts to realize them.
					
					 The recent important proposals made by the National Defence Commission of the DPRK to the south Korean authorities are also part of such efforts.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south of Korea desire peace and peaceful reunification.
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, large-scale joint military drills, which the U.S. and south Korea are planning to stage from late February, are the extremely dangerous actions to push the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					 As even a minor military conflict may immediately lead to an all-out war on the peninsula, no one can vouch that the above-said war exercises targeting the other side will not develop into a real war.
					
					 Lasting peace can neither settle on the peninsula nor can distrust and confrontation between the north and the south be defused as long as such war games continue.
					
					 The prevailing situation clearly proves who is truly working for the peace of this land and who is pursuing confrontation and war.
					
					 Steadfast is the will of the army and people of the DPRK to foil the moves for aggression and war and achieve peace and peaceful reunification of the peninsula by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms U.S. Talk about "World without Nuclear Weapons" Hypocritical
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms U.S. Talk about "World without Nuclear Weapons" Hypocritical 
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The James Martin center for non-proliferation studies of the U.S. recently issued a report saying that the U.S. would spend a trillion U.S. dollars for the modernization of strategic nuclear weapons in three decades to come. This proves once again that the U.S. policy of aggression for world domination with nuclear weapons will never change in the future, too. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says this in a commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Nuclear weapons have been important means for the U.S. to implement its world domination strategy since it produced nuclear weapons, the first of their kind in the human history, and used them. 
					
					 U.S. President Obama talked a lot about "denuclearization" right after he came to power, and noisily advertised that there is a change in the U.S. strategy for dominating the world with nuclear weapons. He talked a great deal that it is the goal of the new administration to build a "world without nuclear weapons" and the U.S. would not pursue nuclear weapons any longer, creating the impression that the U.S. would steer the "denuclearization of the world". 
					
					 However, the passage of time has proved that the U.S. talk about "world without nuclear weapons" is nothing but hypocrisy. 
					
					 It is the scenario of the U.S. to modernize nuclear weapons by spending astronomical figures of funds behind the curtain of "denuclearization" and thus take a hegemonic position in the field of strategic offensive weapons. 
					
					 Another purpose of the U.S. is to pull the noose of "nuclear disarmament" around the neck of the strategic rivals under the signboard of "denuclearization" and induce them to dismantle their nukes and thus retain the unchallenged nuclear edge. 
					
					 The international community should clearly see through the nature of the U.S., arch nuclear criminal, and bring it to justice of history.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Will to Strive for Security and Prosperity of Mankind
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Will to Strive for Security and Prosperity of Mankind
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the DPRK government will as ever make positive efforts for world peace and security and prosperity common to mankind, getting united close with the world progressive people, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article. 
					 It is the consistent foreign policy of the WPK and the DPRK government to strive to develop relations of friendship and cooperation with all countries that respect its sovereignty and are friendly to it, and safeguard global peace and security and achieve prosperity common to mankind, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The WPK and the DPRK government have made positive efforts for prosperity common to mankind while consistently and firmly maintaining the independent stand in foreign relations. 
					
					 The DPRK has never allowed other countries to infringe upon its sovereignty and, at the same time, has done nothing hurting their sovereignty.
					
					 It has estimated and dealt with all matters arising in the international arena with independence as a yardstick. It has been resolutely opposed to all acts of encroaching upon and violating sovereignty of other countries. It remains unchanged in this principle. 
					
					 The DPRK government is developing economic and technical cooperation and cultural exchange on the principle of equality and mutual respects even with capitalist countries that are friendly to it, though they have not diplomatic ties with it, and developing the relations of friendship with the peoples of those countries.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet at Chongjin Port
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet at Chongjin Port
 Chongjin, January 21 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting of foreign crewmen took place at Chongjin Port in North Hamgyong Province Tuesday in support of the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					 The participants laid bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung in Chongjin City and paid tribute. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were captains and crewmen of a Sierra Leon-flagged ship and the Cambodia-flagged ship Matilda. 
					
					 Speakers at the meeting said that all the achievements made by the Korean people last year were ascribable to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Expressing full support for Kim Jong Un's New Year Address, they hoped that the Korean people will successfully implement the tasks set forth in it. 
					
					 They urged the south Korean authorities to stop at once the reckless confrontation rackets and new war provocations and take practical measures for the reunification of Korea. 
					
					 They said that Korea will surely be reunified thanks to Kim Jong Un, adding that they will always express firm support and solidarity for the Korean people's struggle. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Steadfast Ideals of DPRK's Foreign Policy
articles.content:
Steadfast Ideals of DPRK's Foreign Policy
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Independence, peace and friendship are the fixed ideals of the foreign policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government.
					 The DPRK has made constant efforts to realize the ideals reflecting the desire of its people, the aspiration of the world people and the demand of the times. It settles any matter arising in the foreign relations in keeping with the interests of the people and according to its own will and judgment and does never allow any act of violating or impairing its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 The forces hostile toward the DPRK are persistently trying to damage its ever-growing prestige in international arena, but the DPRK exercises its sovereignty in a dignified manner, adhering to the principled and revolutionary stand invariably.
					
					 The DPRK has striven for peace and security in the Korean Peninsula, Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 Just after the 1950-1953 Korean War, it proposed replacing the Armistice Agreement with a lasting peace accord and has so far worked hard for its realization.
					
					 It was entirely thanks to its peace-loving stand and efforts that peace could be maintained on the Korean Peninsula despite the hostile forces' persistent anti-DPRK moves.
					
					 The DPRK has paid deep attention to developing the friendly relations with progressive countries. It is also ready to improve relations with any other countries that respect its sovereignty.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address said that the WPK and the DPRK government will, in the future, too, hold fast to the ideals of the DPRK's foreign policy--independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Production of Honggok Bean Paste Put on Industrial Basis
articles.content:
Production of Honggok Bean Paste Put on Industrial Basis 
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The State Bacilli-Culture Institute of the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK has succeeded in putting the production of Honggok bean paste on an industrial basis.
					 When grain is fermented with some kinds of mould, it become reddish and is called Honggok. Honggok contains bio-active substances considered to be ideal for making functional health foodstuff. The production of Honggok has depended on a traditional method of fermentation in the past.
					
					 But the institute developed a new technology to put its production on an industrial basis.
					
					 The Honggok bean paste is red or red brown and 2.5 times higher and 3.7 times higher than other kinds of bean pastes in amino nitrogen ingredients and sugar-reducing ingredients respectively.
					
					 As it is low in organic acid ingredients, it can be stored for six months.
					
					 The new technology also makes it possible to cut the production days by half.
					
					 The Honggok bean paste is efficient in preventing hypertension, diabetes, digestive troubles and other diseases.

articles.title: Winter Folk Games Popular among Korean Children
articles.content:
Winter Folk Games Popular among Korean Children
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- On Monday when heavy snow hit most areas of Korea, many pupils and other children turned out to play traditional games with snow.
					 In Korea there are a lot of winter folk games, and typical of them are sledding, snowman-making and snowballing popular among children in particular.
					
					 With sledding, which gives feeling of riding on a horse, snowman-making has been enjoyed mainly by girls and snowballing by boys.

articles.title: Songyong Electric Light Decoration Institute
articles.content:
Songyong Electric Light Decoration Institute
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The Masikryong Ski Resort and many other edifices, built in the DPRK in the era of Songun (military-first), have been proud of their fantastic appearances even in the night for their colorful electric light decorations.
					 Various kinds of light decorations were installed to enhance the architectural aesthetic value of all structures.
					
					 Those light decorations have been made by the Songyong Electric Light Decoration Institute.
					
					 Though the institute was newly established, it has carried out many light decoration projects in Pyongyang, Hoeryong and Songrim cities.
					
					 The institute has also set up a central remote supervisory and control system through local network to observe and control the light decorations in Pyongyang.
					
					 The researchers of the institute are now speeding up preparations to make light decorations of new projects in line with their completion.

articles.title: Release of Detained Unionists in S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
Release of Detained Unionists in S. Korea Demanded
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Those concerned of the International Labor Organization held a press conference in Seoul on January 19, at which they chided the south Korean puppet regime for its suppression of members of the Railway Trade Union, the south Korean CBS reported.
					 They declared that they would file a lawsuit in the International Labor Organization against the south Korean regime for its illegal crackdown upon the union and stage an action for the release of the detained unionists.
					
					 They demanded the regime set the detained unionists free as soon as possible.

articles.title: Halt to Joint Military Drills Demanded by S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Halt to Joint Military Drills Demanded by S. Korean Paper
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo on January 17 posted an editorial titled "Key Resolve, Foal Eagle joint military drills should be stopped unconditionally". 
					 The editorial said that the U.S. and south Korea plan to stage the joint military drills from the end of February by mobilizing huge aerial and naval war hardware including large transport planes and large landing craft and armed forces. 
					
					 The drills will be the largest-ever ones as the ill-famed U.S. third naval task force based in Okinawa is to be hurled into them, it said, and went on: These war exercises targeting the north is rendering the situation to an extreme strain and a war may break out on the Korean Peninsula any moment. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the Park Geun Hye regime is taking the double-dealing attitude as if it hoped for improved relations between the south and the north. 
					
					 To stop the north-targeted war exercises is the only way to evade the danger of a war created on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Stop to Suppression of Railway Trade Union Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Suppression of Railway Trade Union Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Railway Trade Union held a rally at the plaza of Seoul Railway Station on Jan. 18. At the rally they reiterated their will to check the puppet authorities' clampdown upon them and stage actions until their struggle for the right to existence proves successful.
					 Present there were more than 10,000 workers.
					
					 Speakers at the rally recalled that the public security authorities recently put core members of their organizations including the chairman of the Railway Trade Union behind bars, adding such method can never hinder the struggle of the workers.
					
					 Warning that they will again opt for a struggle in case the authorities continue laying off workers en masse and taking coercive measures, they urged the regime to stop its suppression of the trade union at once.
					
					 They held that the director of the railway corporation should immediately step down as he is kowtowing to the political camp in a bid to gratify his despicable greed while groundlessly turning down the union's dialogue proposal.
					
					 They warned that they will turn out in an all-out strike if the regime enforces privatization policy despite the opposition of people.
					
					 Stressing they would stage actions until the detained workers are set free and their demand is met, they called on people from all walks of life including workers, the poor and peasants to stage joint actions.

articles.title: DPRK's Cause of National Reunification Supported by Brazilian Figure
articles.content:
DPRK's Cause of National Reunification Supported by Brazilian Figure
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering general secretary Kim Jong Il issued a statement on January 15 in support of the proposal for national reunification set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 He said:
					
					 Marshal of the DPRK Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address called for making fresh advance in the national reunification movement this year true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The proposal for national reunification set forth by him in his New Year Address is the most just and reasonable one.
					
					 The north and the south of Korea should adhere to the principle of independence clarified in the three principles of national reunification and the north-south joint declarations, firmly maintain the standpoint of By Korean Nation Itself and respect and sincerely implement the joint declarations.
					
					 It is the precondition for prosperity of the Korean nation to place the dignity and interests of the nation above all and approach and solve all problems on the principle of national independence.
					
					 As indicated by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address the north and the south should work hard to defend national security and peace and establish a climate for improved north-south ties while rejecting foreign forces and firmly maintaining the standpoint of By Korean Nation Itself.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad will conduct a nationwide reunification movement with burning patriotism and full of fresh conviction and thus usher in a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year.
					
					 The DPRK's cause of national reunification will be achieved without fail.

articles.title: French Organization Introduces Masikryong Ski Resort
articles.content:
French Organization Introduces Masikryong Ski Resort
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association posted an article introducing Masikryong Ski Resort of the DPRK on its website on Jan. 15.
					 The article said:
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the construction site of the resort several times to build it as early as possible.
					
					 The resort draws great admiration among people as it serves as the best sports center.
					
					 The DPRK is attaching primary significance to economic construction and the improvement of the people's living standard and orientating everything to the well-being of the people.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the resort, a comprehensive winter sports center fully equipped with all conditions necessary for sports, tourism and recreation.
					
					 The ski resort built by service personnel of the Korean People's Army in a short span of time true to the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea is one of the successes achieved by the DPRK.
					
					 The will of the DPRK to reach the world standard as soon as possible can be found not only in sports but also in education, healthcare and all other fields.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Cuban Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Cuban Personage
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The vice-president of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples expressed support to the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 He said when meeting with the charge d'affaires ad interim of the DPRK embassy in Havana on Jan. 8:
					
					 I deeply studied Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					
					 He in his New Year Address called for rejecting foreign forces and reunifying the country by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 Park Geun Hye of south Korea tries to solve the issue by relying on outsiders, an act of treachery, and this will drive the north-south relations into a more catastrophic phase.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is extremely dangerous due to ceaseless nuclear war drills by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 If this situation persists, the inter-Korean relations can never be improved.
					
					 Korea will surely be reunified when all Koreans turn out to defend national security and peace and create the atmosphere of improved inter-Korean ties.
					
					 Hoping to see independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, we will always extend full support and solidarity to this

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Newspapers of Russia, Mozambique
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Newspapers of Russia, Mozambique
 Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un was carried by newspapers of Russia and Mozambique.
					 The January 16 issue of a Russian paper Sluzh Otsechestv edited the full text of the New Year Address and the January 14 issue of the Mozambican paper Noticias the part of Korea's reunification in it.
					
					 The Mozambican paper carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion conjunta de amistad Corea-China por Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion conjunta de amistad Corea-China por Ano Nuevo
 Pyongyang, 21 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 21 en el Salon Musical del Conservatorio Kim Won Gyun de Pyongyang la funcion conjunta de amistad Corea-China por el Ano Nuevo 2014 bajo coauspicios del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y el Comite Central de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-China, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y el Ministerio de Cultura de la Republica Popular China y la embajada china en Corea. 
					 La vieron la presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jong Suk, el ministro de Salud Publica, Kang Ha Guk, quien es presidente del CC de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-China, los funcionarios de ministerios y organos centrales, artistas, deportistas y trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					 Tambien figuraban entre los espectadores el embajador Liu Hongcai y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica china, los matrimonios de representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales en Corea y los huespedes chinos que se encuentran en Corea. 
					
					 Antes del inicio de la funcion, Kang Ha Guk y Liu Hongcai pronunciaron discursos. 
					
					 Luego, comenzo la funcion conjunta de los profesores y estudiantes del Conservatorio Kim Won Gyun de Pyongyang y los miembros del conjunto de canciones y danzas de la provincia de Jilin de China. 
					
					 Los artistas coreanos dejaron muy impresionados a los espectadores con el trio mixto y pangchang "Himno a la patria", el solo femenino "El pueblo con toda el alma", el solo femenino folclorico "Colina Moran" y las canciones chinas. 
					
					 Los artistas chinos pusieron en la escena la danza "China hermosa" y otras piezas e interpretaron bien la cancion coreana "Campanula". 
					
					 La funcion termino con el coro "Sera eterna la amistad Corea-China". 
					
					 El espectaculo marco un hito para desarrollar mas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad entre los pueblos de dos paises.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por dia de triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por dia de triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana
 Pyongyang, 21 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 55o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana, el embajador de la republica de Cuba en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, ofrecio el dia 21 un banquete. 
					 Fueron invitados el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Yang Hyong Sop, el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Il, el ministro de Comercio Exterior, Ri Ryong Nam, la presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jong Suk, Kim Hyong Jun, Chae Chun Hui y otros funcionarios correspondientes, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, agregados militares de embajadas y representantes de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea. 
					
					 Al hacer uso de la palabra, el embajador cubano dijo que el triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana fue resultado de la lucha de sacrificio de los revolucionarios y patriotas, y les rindio sublime homenaje. 
					
					 Apunto que el pueblo cubano logro grandes exitos a pesar del continuo bloqueo para sofocar la Revolucion Cubana y seguira luchando tambien en el futuro contra el imperialismo. 
					
					 Calificando de solidas las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises preparadas por los grandes lideres, puntualizo que el pueblo cubano estara siempre al lado del pueblo coreano. 
					
					 Deseo que bajo la sabia orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el heroico pueblo coreano alcance mayores exitos. 
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop senalo en su discurso que bajo la correcta guia del Partido Comunista de Cuba, el pueblo cubano vino defendiendo la patria, la revolucion y las conquistas del socialismo frustrando la brutal campana del imperialismo norteamericano para aislar y atropellar a Cuba. 
					
					 Deseo que el pueblo cubano logre mayores exitos en la lucha por materializar la resolucion del VI Congreso del PCC. 
					
					 Las relaciones de camaraderia entre los dos paises forjadas por los grandes lideres continuan bajo la profunda atencion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, afirmo y continuo que en lo adelante tambien, el pueblo coreano se esforzara con teson junto con el pueblo cubano por la paz y seguridad del mundo y la prosperidad comun de la humanidad.

articles.title: Preservar la paz es firme voluntad de la RPDC, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Preservar la paz es firme voluntad de la RPDC, destaca Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, 21 de enero (ACNC) -- La preservacion de la paz es la invariable politica y la firme voluntad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, asi subraya el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado el dia 21 y continua:
					 Para poner fin al inestable sistema de armisticio y establecer el sistema de paz duradera, la RPDC presento hasta la fecha varias propuestas y se esforzo por cumplirlas.
					
					 Como parte de ello, el Comite de Defensa Nacional formulo recientemente unas propuestas importantes a las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					 Todos los coreanos del Norte y el Sur anhelan la paz y la reunificacion pacifica.
					
					 En contraste, Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea planean librar desde finales de febrero los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" que llevaran la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a la fase de guerra nuclear.
					
					 Puesto que se crea en la Peninsula Coreana una situacion tan critica en que cualquier pequeno choque militar puede extenderse a la guerra total, no hay ninguna garantia de que los ejercicios de guerra no se ampliaran a la guerra de verdad.
					
					 Mientras continuan en el Sur de Corea las maniobras belicas contra la connacional RPDC, no se implantara la paz en la Peninsula Coreana ni seran eliminadas la desconfianza y confrontacion entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					 La realidad demuestra claramente quien se esfuerza por la paz de Corea y quien persigue la confrontacion y la guerra.
					
					 No se cambiara nunca la voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de lograr la paz y la reunificacion pacifica de la Peninsula Coreana con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion frustrando las maniobras agresivas y belicas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a abrir nueva era dorada de construccion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a abrir nueva era dorada de construccion
 Pyongyang, 21 de enero (ACNC) -- En el editorial divulgado el dia 21, el diario Rodong Sinmun llama a registrar grandes innovaciones en la construccion, en acato al gran proposito del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, para abrir la nueva era dorada de construccion. 
					 La construccion es la causa patriotica para edificar un Estado prospero socialista y paraiso del pueblo y la labor importante para consolidar el poderio economico del pais y elevar el nivel de civilizacion, senala el editorial y continua:
					
					 El Mariscal Kim Jong Un tiene la ferrea voluntad de preparar en un corto plazo la firme base de la potencia economica socialista y abrir la nueva era de civilizacion del siglo XXI, llevando adelante la autoctona idea arquitectonica y las proezas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Todos los constructores deben crear la "velocidad Masikryong" con la ambicion de hacerse creadores de meritos laborales y constructores heroes en la epoca actual en que se abre la nueva era de prosperidad en la construccion. 
					
					 Hay que levantar mucho mas edificios monumentales que representan la epoca mediante la cooperacion entre militares y civiles, poderoso modo de lucha de la Corea del Songun. 
					
					 La nueva era de prosperidad en la construccion requiere el apoyo activo de varios dominios de la economia nacional. 
					
					 La industria metalurgica, la de materiales de construccion, la carbonifera, el transporte ferroviario y otros dominios de la economia nacional deben avivar las llamas de auge productivo e impulsar con energia la gran construccion proyectada por el partido.

articles.title: Proyecto norteamericano de "mundo desnuclearizado" es embuste, comenta Minju Joson
articles.content:
Proyecto norteamericano de "mundo desnuclearizado" es embuste, comenta Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, 21 de enero (ACNC) -- El Centro de Estudios de No Proliferacion James Martin de Estados Unidos publico un reporte anunciando que su pais desembolsara durante 30 anos futuros un billon de US$ para la modernizacion de armas nucleares estrategicas. 
					 Asi quedo confirmado una vez mas que no se cambiara nunca la politica agresiva de EE.UU. de realizar su ambicion de dominar el mundo con armas nucleares, revela el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este martes que sigue:
					
					 EE.UU. fabrico y uso por primera vez en la historia de la humanidad esas armas de exterminio masivo que desde aquel entonces, le sirvieron como medio importante para realizar su estrategia de hegemonia mundial. 
					
					 Al principio de su mandato, el presidente estadounidense Obama preconizo tanto la "desnuclearizacion" como si hubiera algun cambio en la estrategia de hegemonia mundial segun las armas nucleares. 
					
					 Dijo que construir un "mundo sin armas nucleares" es la meta de la nueva administracion estadounidense y que EE.UU. no perseguira mas esos armamentos mortiferos sino encauzara el proceso de "desnuclearizacion del mundo". 
					
					 Pero, el tiempo transcurrido demostro que son embustes sus discursos. 
					
					 Detras del cartel de "desnuclearizacion", EE.UU. intenta modernizar sus armas nucleares malgastando fondos astronomicos y tomar la posicion hegemonica en el domino de armas estrategicas de ataque. 
					
					 Al mismo tiempo, para garantizar su absoluta superioridad nuclear, intenta hacer a sus rivales estrategicos cancelar sus arsenales nucleares. 
					
					 La sociedad internacional debe someter a EE.UU. al tribunal de la historia calando a fondo su naturaleza de criminal nuclear.
